mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectEvt Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ EVT_NO , UPPER_EVT_NO , RPRST_LWPRT_SECT_CD , SORT_SEQ , EVT_GOD_SORT_STDR_CD , EVT_NM , EVT_DSCR , EVT_TP_CD , EVT_STAT_CD , EVT_CNCL_DSCR , EVT_BEG_DT , EVT_END_DT , DSP_YN , GNB_UPEND_BANNER_EXPSR_YN , PC_MOBILE_RPRST_IMG_IND_USE_YN , PC_MOBILE_BCRN_IMG_IND_USE_YN , EVT_DETAIL_TP_CD , PC_URL , MOBILE_URL , PC_HTML , MOBILE_HTML , APPLCN_BEG_DT , APPLCN_END_DT , DATEBY_APPLCN_BEG_HOUR , DATEBY_APPLCN_END_HOUR , DRWT_DATE , PRIZE_PRESNATN_DATE , FREE_GIFT_SND_DATE , APPLCN_COUNT_SECT_CD , PCH_AMT_STDR_CD , PARTCPTN_BEG_PCH_AMT , PARTCPTN_END_PCH_AMT , PCH_PD_BEG_DT , PCH_PD_END_DT , APPLCN_MTHD_CD , EVT_SPRTR_TP_CD , EMP_EXCLS_YN , PRIZE_HIST_CD , PCH_CND_CD , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM EVT WHERE 1 = 1 AND EVT_NO = #{evtNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: DELETE /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.deleteEvt Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ FROM EVT WHERE 1 = 1 AND EVT_NO = #{evtNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
